cf.FieldList._FillValue¶

FieldList._FillValue¶

The _FillValue CF property of each field.

fl._FillValue is equivalent to cf.List(f._FillValue for f in fl).

fl._FillValue = value is equivalent to for f in fl: f._FillValue = value.

del fl._FillValue is equivalent to for f in fl: del f._FillValue.

See cf.Field._FillValue for details.
